mainScreen.mainText: The color test "Colors of my life" is a modification of the Lusher test, suggested by Doctor of Psychological Sciences Ivan Anatolyevich Ognev. Working with the text begins with conducting a psychological audit of your problem
mainScreen.firstParagraph: 1. Psychological audit of any life problem
mainScreen.firstButtonText: View the scheme of psychological audit
mainScreen.secondButtonText: An example of a psychological audit
mainScreen.secondParagraph: 2. Transfer of psychological audit data to the neuropsychological expert system "Colors of my life".
mainScreen.thirdParagraph: 3. The result of deciphering the psychological audit of a life problem
mainScreen.foursParagraph: 4. How to remove the problem from your head and reduce stress?
mainScreen.textBeforeAlert: Upon decoding the psychological audit, the expert system "Colors of my life" immediately "sees" a set of colors that you need to get rid of the stress caused by the problem.
mainScreen.boldTextBeforeAlert: Such a set of colors is called a color correction course and is a video file in which an individual complex of color highlights is recorded in a certain sequence. You need to watch the course for 15-20 minutes 1-2 times a day
mainScreen.alertText: This app allows you to transfer your psychological audit data to the "Colors of My Life" neuropsychological expert system for free and buy a one-month color correction course to view on your mobile device. You can also pay for professional psychological counseling and detailed understanding of your life problem.
mainScreen.lastWords: Regards to you, Todor Milykh. Master of Psychological Sciences, Clinical Psychologist

colorgram.subtitleSecondPart: ! I hope you have successfully passed the psychological audit of your problem. Now it is time to build a color chart of your problem using the data of the psychological audit.  To do this, fill in the central circle of the color chart "My present Me".

colorgramInfo.title: How do you want to watch the color correction?

modalAddingProps.firstComment: ,please write down the area of your life that causes the most concern. Next, enter the problem closest to you from this area, select its color and determine the emotion that this problem makes you experience
modalAddingProps.secondComment: , enter the problem closest to you, characteristic of this sphere of life. Take your time! Enter what is really important to you
modalAddingProps.thirdComment: , determine the emotion that this problem is experiencing you. Remember how you feel when you think about this problem...
modalAddingProps.fourthComment: , what color is associated with this problem
modalAddingProps.fifthComment: , now choose a shade of this color

modalMainSegment.firstComment: , enter a problem from your life that you are struggling with
modalMainSegment.secondComment: ,what color would you depict your own "I" or your current state? Please fill in the central circle of your color chart with this color
modalMainSegment.thirdComment: , now choose a shade of this color
modalMainSegment.fourthComment: , check again the color you have chosen

modalSubmitCologram.firstComment: , choose the color of your state of mind, if this problem did not exist or it would have already been resolved!
modalSubmitCologram.secondComment: , now choose a shade of this color
modalSubmitCologram.thirdComment: All sectors of the color chart are full!  Now you can buy a personal color correction module! Daily viewing the color correction will relieve the stress of your problem! By returning to a calm state of mind, you will easily and quickly find the most correct solution for this problem!
